features: SMALL BRUSH WITH DUSTPAN - Measurement 14.2 x 8.7 inches. The small household handheld dustpan and brush set has a natural bamboo handle, and the soft bristles are enough dense and durable, they won't scratch the surface. Even the smallest dust is being swept up.

DESIGN FEATURES - The handle of the bamboo brush adopts a curved design, smooth and comfortable to hold. The soft rubber lip of the pan has good resilience, well keeps it flat on the floor, and the built-in raised bar of the dustpan makes debris not easy to fall out.

MULTI-USE - The mini dustpan and brush set is your ideal household assistant, perfect for use for pet care, home floor, kitchen, sofa, carpets, offices desktops, keyboards, cars, camping, garage, RVs, boat, etc. It will sweep up dust and fine particles effectively.
COMPACT STORAGE - Thoughtfully fitted a string on the handheld broom and dustpan set, convenient to hang up after use, easy to store, and saving space.

OUR SERVICE - If you’re not happy about the product, you’re covered by a full refund or exchange. Please feel free to contact us if you may have any questions, we are honored by your support and advice, it will push us to improvement.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SMALL MULTI-FUNCTION SMALL DUSTPAN AND BROOM SET MULTI-FUNCTION DUSTPAN AND BROOM SET With angled broom is made of natural bamboo, and the handle adopts a streamlined and circle-curved design that provides a secure and comfortable grip for cleaning. The soft rubber lip has good resilience and always keeps well flat with the floor. The raised bar prevents debris inside from spilling out of the dustpan. The handle of the small broom is long enough to well hold.

GO INTO DETAILS BUILT-IN TEETH FOR BRUSH CLEANING Keep grooved 'sawtooth' on the outer edge of the dustpan helps to remove debris and hair from the hand broom. Soft bristles made of nylon makes it easy to sweep surface and reach corners replacing anywhere that the vacuum cleaner cannot reach. CONVENIENT STORAGE & COMPACT Dustpan and broom snap together to store away neatly in a cabinet or hang on a hook. Equipped with a hemp looped cord that makes storage easy anywhere. RUBBER LIP ON DUST PAN The rubber lip on the dustpan helps pick up even the smallest particles.after sweeping up a pile of dirt off the floor use this convenient dustpan set to help transport it to your garbage can.

Includes a dustpan and a brush in a pack Construction - bamboo wood, Placstic, nylon bristles Dimensions - 12.7 in x 8.67 in (dustpan), 11.41 in x 2.76 in (brush) Cleaning and care - wash with soapy water, and wipe the bamboo handle to dry immediately

PRODUCT'S ADVANTAGE FROM HONGBOXIN WHY TO RECOMMEND USING THIS CLEANING TOOL We are the original factory designer and manufacturer, and our products can bring you great value for money. We have overall quality management for product lines to ensure high quality. This brush and dustpan set has many advantages: - includes a dustpan and a brush in the package - handle made of bamboo with a non-slip grip for easy control, promotes a comfortable grip -soft thick bristles made of nylon make it easy to collect dirt, dust, and debris on the surface and corners - rubber lip on the dustpan helps pick up even the smallest particles - equipped with a hemp looped cord for convenient storage - large collection area means fewer trips to empty the dustpan - easy to wash with soapy water, wipe the bamboo handle to dry immediately

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First dust pan and brush that picks up everything and doesn't leave a small line of dirt at the edge of the dust pan. Brush is thick and sweeps up everything but is soft enough to never scratch the surface. I use it to sweep up around the litter box which is a tough task. I have an extra large litter box with high sides and my 5 lb. 17 yo cat still manages to scatter litter everywhere. I think she is digging the Panama Canal. Dogs have masters and cats have servants. I am Dakota's servant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As of right now, i have not had any issues with this product. It’s a very pretty color, and gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy, you have no idea. I have been searching for some time, for a decent dust pan and brush. The one that I had drove me absolutely insane. The bristles on it were too hard, and the pan itself was pure garbage. This new dust pan and brush, are fantastic by contrast. So important to a dust pan, is the rubber lip which makes contact with the floor, and this one has that, and works extremely well. I like that the bristles on the brush are nice and soft, because it makes it easier to pick up both coarse and fine particles. Not that it really matters, but it is an attractive looking set as well. Most importantly, it works extremely well, and I couldn't be happier about it. It's strange that little things in life, oftentimes make big differences, and as stupid as it sounds, a good dust pan and brush, are a necessity for maintaining one's home. I do recommend this brush, and pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Looking Simple Dustpan Set
reviews.reviewText: It's a dustpan, what do you need to know? The colors are good with gray and natural wood. The bristles aren't too soft and not too firm, and they work well to sweep up most messes. I like that there is a bit of rope in the handle of the brush to hang on a wall. Most importantly, it's not a goofy gaudy color so I don't mind it hanging around my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poorly designed dust pan and brush
reviews.reviewText: This is a so poorly designed. The brush is stiff and hard to sweep up first and dust. The dustpan has a rubber strip that curls up and it’s hard to sweep anything in to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I make moss wall art and it is MESSY. There's always little pieces of moss everywhere and it's super annoying to clean! This dustpan makes it a lot easier: it's really sturdy and well-made, and the brush works super well and doesn't leave much behind or stuck in the crack between the pan and the floor. It's made moss clean-up faster and easier. I'd definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lip of Pan Doesn't Create a Seal on the Floor
reviews.reviewText: This little dust pan and brush would be great if the front edge of the pan was flush with the floor. As it is, when I sweep cat litter into the pan, a good portion goes underneath. It takes a lot of brushing to get the daily cleaning around the litter box done. I bought two of these sets and they're both bothersome. It would have been better to spend a bit more money and save the time spent brushing litter around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little broom and dustpan set. It's nice to have a basic household item that looks attractive and works well. This item is so essential in the kitchen to sweep up the crumbs dropped and dust accumulating in the corners. I think I use it almost everyday-it's comfortable to hold, the bristles and the dustpan work well together. Very happy with this!
